name: TalkSmoke
_source: speak;Sages;Oh dear! He's frozen!|Do we have a healer? Anyone?
speak;Smoke;Bwahaha! You shoulda seen the look on your face!
speak;Sages;So, Smoke, how are you? With the war and all.
speak;Smoke;I don't see how my feelings are relevant here.
speak;Smoke;My job's to make everyone happy.|That's good enough for me, in spite of any circumstances.
speak;Smoke;Now, for my next trick, SMOKESCREEN GO!
speak;Sages;Woah! Smoke? Smoooooke?|Hm, wonder where he vanished...|Looks like he dropped something
speak;Sages;Guess he had a gift for me the whole time...|Always confusing...
